attributes.action: was it reasonable for remain to incite hatred of the elderly to gain advantage
attributes.additional_details: I believe people should have a rite to vote as they please without fear of the consequences  . As we prosecute people for races related hate crime I believe  now is the time to give the elderly the same lever  protection of protection we give to others  in the UK
attributes.background: I have  confirmation from the electoral commission that the only data collected at the referendum in 2016 was total votes for leave/remain and if a person voted , also they did not carry out any research as to the reason  anyone voted leave/ remain .So no/age education data

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

You can find out more about what constitutes a hate crime here:

https://www.cps.gov.uk/hate-crime

You could start a new petition if you would like a crime to be considered as a hate crime where it demonstrates hostility based on someone's age.
